name: Shelf Life (ancep, NaNixDev, gosha05)
description:
This game was made for Trijam #172. All code and assets were created in three hours or less (Per Teammate).

Theme: Off the Shelf. 

Keep the falling objects from landing on Shelfy the shelf! Shelfy can only hold so much weight before he falls apart.

Instructions: Left and Right arrow keys to move, the 'A' and 'D' keys also work!

Art: @NaNixDev NaNixDev - itch.io
Programming: @ancep ancep - itch.io
Sound: @gosha05 gosha05 - itch.io
